keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dem team won their fight for dropped kerbs to improve access for wheelchair users and pushchairs.
Valerie & Phil are pushing for the dangerous taxi rank to be removed so that pedestrians & cyclists do not come into conflict.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for a pedestrian crossing on Histon Road
Fighting to secure traffic calming on Canterbury Street
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Valerie is trying to get new traffic calming measures installed to improve safety for local residents.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Working to improve the off road cycle path
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Consulted with residents over the NW site development. Worked with the local community to ensure their voice was heard over proposals.
Pushed to ensure the entrance to the green space was refurbished.
Valerie & the team got a new sign for the 'Ascham burial ground' along with reminders not to litter.
Fought for and received a commitment for pushing for new cycle racks.

mentions.candidate: Valerie has lived in Castle for 45 years. She understands the local issues & the issues people face here.

housing.content: Consulted with residents over the NW site development. Worked with the local community to ensure their voice was heard over proposals.

leaflet.personalStatement: Valerie has lived in Castle for 45 years. She understands the local issues & the issues people face here.

images.caption: Valerie Holt campaign leaflet images demonstrating various local community improvements and engagements.
